description: Chrome Browser Extensions (extensions from the official Chrome Webstore)

repository.note: There is no documented API, only a sitemap and 'updatecheck' endpoints.

name_definition.note: The name is a 32 characters a-z and is case insensitive

version_definition.note: The chrome extension version is semver-like but 1-4 segments

note: There is currently no documented API for querying different versions of a package - there only seems to be responses on the latest version. To this end the version component of a chrome purl can be optional.
